inputs.name: deployment_name
inputs.description: The name of the current deployment

inputs.name: network_name
inputs.description: The name of the network to be created. Defaults to {deployment_name}_net if null.

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: Project in which the HPC deployment will be created

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: The region where Cloud NAT and Cloud Router will be configured

outputs.name: nat_ips
outputs.description: the external IPs assigned to the NAT

outputs.name: network_name
outputs.description: The name of the network created

outputs.name: network_self_link
outputs.description: The URI of the VPC being created

outputs.name: primary_subnetwork
outputs.description: The subnetwork in the specified primary region
